title: Ember Alpaca Wool Plaid Throw Blanket
body_html:
Free Shipping Worldwide (5-7 Days)



Handmade 100% Ember Alpaca Wool Plaid Throw Blanket




We replace all damaged, lost, stolen or incorrect parcels. Enjoy a 30-day money back insurance included in our Return & Refund Policy.

 

 


 

 

 

Color:

Beige - Grey

 

 

Features:

  • HANDMADE OF PURE 100% ALPACA YARN (NO BLENDS OR SHEDDING YARN USED): Hand-woven using 100% genuine alpaca fiber, this luxurious 48" x 70" blanket throw will keep you warm on those cold winter days and nights. Manufactured exclusively for Ella Ember in Bolivia's highlands, this limited production blanket throw will stand out for its quality and durability. This blanket does not shed, because we don't brush the final product or use brushed yarn to make it.
  • WARM, COZY, HYPOALLERGENIC: Thanks to the insulating and moisture protection properties of alpaca, this throw will keep you warm and cozy while you watch a movie, read a book, or just choose to relax. Alpaca is also hypoallergenic, so there is no need to worry about having a reaction to the material. Not too thin, not too think, this blanket has the right weight and thickness to keep you comfortably warm.
  • IT HAS MANY USES, EASY TO PACK: It can be used as an ALL-PURPOSE TRAVEL BLANKET and for OUTDOOR ACTIVITIES: Such as camping. Fold it and place it in a large air-tight plastic bag and it becomes compact enough to be placed in any carry-on or small bag.
  • VERSATILE HOME ACCENT: Its beautiful and unique design will dress up ANY BED or your FAVORITE COUCH. It will be a great addition to your home décor.
  • GREAT GIFT: Carefully handcrafted and finished, this blanket was made with such care and love, that by gifting it to that special someone you show them your sincere appreciation. Great present for weddings, housewarming parties, birthdays, retirement, and any other special occasion.

 

 

Details:

This luxurious 100% alpaca plaid blanket throw is hand-woven in wooden looms by highly skilled artisans in Bolivia, using prime quality yarn. The fringe is handmade, as well.

This blanket was exclusively designed by Ella Ember and is produced in limited quantities.

We take pride in ethically producing this product. We work only with artisans who work from home while taking care of their kids. We negotiate with them a fair price for their work and provide them with training when needed. We source our alpaca yarn from reputable companies that obtain their fiber by shearing the animal in a humane manner.

Because this is a pure alpaca product, it offers the wonderful qualities that come with this noble material: It is soft, warm, hypoallergenic, protects against moisture, and, with the right care, is very durable.

You can easily clean it. Due to the hollow structure of alpaca fibers, just airing the product will leave it free of any odors. For best results, hand-wash your throw with cold water using regular shampoo (alpaca is animal hair after all!). It also can be machine-washed with cold water using the gentle hand-wash cycle and a detergent for wool. Do not use the dryer . Lay the blanket flat over a towel and let it dry. Use warm iron if needed.

 

UPC: 10725676350

EAN: 10725676350

Package Dimensions: 12.5 x 10.3 x 1.6 inches

title: Ergonomic Baby Front Facing HipSeat Baby Carrier
body_html:
Give your baby the view of a lifetime and a hefty dose of brain development with the 3-in1 Ergonomic Baby Carrier. This forward-facing, supersoft carrier supplies your baby with plenty of visual stimulation and distraction as you go about your day! This revolutionary product strives to make parents' life easier by providing them with a safe and comfortable way to bring their child with them without the risk of back problems. With our ergonomic carrier you can enjoy your nurturing time with your baby without the worry of random pangs of agony!

  • Ergonomically Designed：With a 30-degree slope, this infant carrier allows the baby to sit in a natural M-position as opposed to traditional carriers that cause pressure and discomfort on delicate baby hips; Ensures healthy skeletal development in all seating positions; Dotted seat surface gives the baby a better grip.
  • X-Cross Shoulder Strap Design: Allows stress to even out between your shoulders and waist, ultimately minimizing stress on your back and abdomen. We’ve also included plush, extra-padded shoulder straps for your protection and ease of use.
  • Room For Your Belongings: Four multi-purpose pockets on side and front to safely stow personal items, such as phone, wallet, pacifier. A tuckaway baby hood included for wind and sun protection.
  • Breathable,Light-weigth Material: Made from soft, breathable fabrics. Zippered 3D mesh front pocket to keep baby cool. Filling is made from environmentally-friendly EPP. Waterproof, durable, machine-washable.
  • Adjusts to fit different adult sizes, from petite to plus-size
  • Allows baby to sit in three different seating positions: Front facing, inward facing, and assist/horizontal position.

Key Features
  • Multiple Function Air Cooler: This industrial air cooler has a 3-in-1 multi-function design, which will replace your air conditioner cooler, fan, and air humidifier. It filters out the hot air and blows out cool and moist air. The versatile design and efficient cooling system make it suitable for larger areas, such as supermarkets, factories, and offices.
  • 2 Drain Ports & 7-gallon Water Tank: This industrial air cooler has two drain ports - an upper drain port and a lower drain port, which makes it easy to drain the additional water. A 7-gallon water tank eliminates the frequent need to refill the water over and over again. Also, it is equipped with a transparent window that allows you to look inside and see the accurate water level at all times.
  • Fast Cooling Down: There are 3 different fast cooling speeds to choose from, as it provides standard, natural and sleep mode. Also, our fans will help the room cool down while improving airflow, reducing energy consumption and costs.
  • Remote Control & 12-hour Timing: The remote control helps you operate it more comfortably and conveniently. Also, the 12-hour timing function allows you to set the automatic shutdown time, allowing you to have a good night's sleep, without having to wake up to turn it off.
  • Flexible Mobile & Wide-Angle Air Supply: The large air outlet distributes the cool air evenly and provides a wide range of air supply. Besides, the flexible universal wheels allow you to easily rotate or move it in any desired direction or position.

title: Folding Stainless Steel  Charcoal/ Wood Burning Stove
body_html:
Highlights

Titanium construction extreme durability as well as minimal weight. Wide opening design for convenient adding wood and improved air flow, higher burning efficiency.

Cross-stand trivet creates a stable cooking platform for any pot size. Easy to set up and cook a meal with unlimited fuels: wood, twigs, branches, leaves. Weighs only 7.2oz and packs flat that fits into your pocket and backpack, very easy to carry.

This stove is made of a titanium construction, extremely durable and super light. Connect all the panels on each side, which will take a few seconds to complete.

ook a meal with fuel easy to find, unlimited as wood, branches, leaves and paper to cook a meal wherever you set your camp, without chemical emissions, is not the carbon footprint? Fold the flat stove and put it in a pocket or backpack to start a low carbon trip.

Never worry about running out of fuel. No need to carry any heavy bulky fuel with you. With the Outlaw Stove you're hiking light and camping in a sustainable nature

Specification

Brand:ALL4U

Grill Grate Material:Titanium

Grill Size:Small

Cooking Area Width:12.5 cm

Configuration:Foldable

Details

 

FUEL FREE - Fueled entirely on the organic matter like twigs, sticks, bark, moss, pine cones/needles near your camp.

It can be used with fuel tablets and charcoal too. Never worry about running out of fuel.

No need to carry any heavy bulky fuel with you.

With the Outlaw Stove you're hiking light and camping in a sustainable nature.

FLAT COLLAPSIBLE DESIGN - Light Weight at only 12.9 oz. 

Easily slides into a bug out bag or backpack with zero bulk.

304 STAINLESS STEEL - Our survival stove is not only anti-corrosive, it's also extremely strong.

Designed for extreme durability and stability. Makes a great bushcraft grill.

OUTLAW STRIKER WATERPROOF FIRESTARTER - High quality, all weather waterproof magnesium rod fire starter with multi-tool.

Lasts up to 10,000 plus strikes and produces a shower of burning sparks at 5500°F even in the wind!

 

 

The Outlaw Stove has a simple 5-panel design  Packs down quickly to less than 6" x 6" (under 0.029 inches thick).

title: Fork 5x5 Art Block
body_html: “Fork:" original artwork by Michelle Ciarlo-Hayes, carefully mounted on a reclaimed wood block that she's lovingly covered with vintage book pages. Every block is sealed with multiple layers of non-toxic matte varnish and signed on the reverse. This lovely 5x5 art block would be perfect on your wall, mantel or shelf, and each block arrives ready to hang with a keyhole opening on the back: no need to add hardware. No two are alike on the sides and reverse: the salvaged book paper on your block makes each one a true original (the paper on your block will look similar to the one in the photo but will not be identical). Be happy knowing your eco-friendly photo block has been created with love from reclaimed wood!

body_html:
Details

The Geneva series raises outdoor living to a whole new level of style and class. This swivel and recline sofa is featuring a stylish combination of teak, powder-coated aluminum, and padded Textilene for comfort. it raises the bar on sophistication for those basking in the pleasure of outdoor dining.

  . 1 x Dining Table - W35.4'' D35.4'' H29.1'' with Aluminium and Teak

  . Color: Gloss Champagne Frame and Coffee Textilene

  . Materials:

       Frame - Powder Coated Aluminum

       Armrests - 100% Grade A Teak

       Back and Seat - Textilene with Quick-Dry foam padding.

About Grade A teak

Grade A teak refers to the mature heartwood of a teak tree. In order to harvest mature heartwood, a teak tree needs to be about 20 years old or more. This is the timber that comes from the very center of the trunk of a teak tree. Grade A teak is rich with natural oil. Grade A teak is what you want your furniture made from. When a teak tree is harvested, less than a quarter of the available wood will be Grade A. So this makes Grade A teak relatively expensive. 

Tips: You can brush the wood wax oil to keep the original color of teak every few months.

Room to room, house to house or home to work, LG’s portable air conditioner is the ideal climate-control solution for when you’re on the go. With a sleek contemporary design, this free-standing portable unit blends in with any room decor. Our auto-swing air vent technology makes sure you enjoy every bit of cool air by circulating the cool air more efficiently so no hot spot will be left untouched.

The auto evaporation system allows for continuous use and with the programmable 24-hour on/off timer, you can control the temperature even when you’re not there. In October 2017, the Department of Energy implemented a new test procedure to determine the BTU rating of portable air conditioners.

The procedural change has adjusted the amount of BTUs allowed to be claimed downward by as much as 50%. There have been no internal changes to these units, and the functionality remains the same. Please refer to room size guidelines to find the portable air conditioner that best meets your needs.
